front.title: An analysis of scaling issues in MPLS-TE backbone networks

abstract.t: Traffic engineered Multiprotocol Label Switching (MPLS-TE) is being deployed in provider's backbone networks. The providers wish to grow these networks, and need to discover whether existing protocols and implementations can support the network sizes that they are planning. This document presents an analysis of some of the scaling concerns for MPLS-TE backbone networks, and examines the value of two techniques for improving scaling.
